Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Prelude/IO/iprintToFile
Synopsis Print an indented representation of a value to the specified location.
Function void iprintToFile(loc file, value arg)
Usage import IO;
Description See iprint for a version that displays the result on the console and iprintExp for a version that returns its argument as result and iprintln for a version that adds a newline.
Examples 
rascal>import IO;
ok
rascal>iprintToFile(|file:///tmp/fruits.txt|, ["fruits", ("spider" : 8, "snake" : 0), [10, 20, 30]]);
ok
